name: TWITCH co-op game
description:
Goal of the game is to escape the dungeon. Chat players need to stay in the zone of the streamer. Chat players can recharge zone size by opening chests and they need to open the doors for the streamer.

STREAMER controlls:

AWSD: move character

ARROW KEYS: shoot in direction

CHAT player controls:

Type the number in the chat to send your character to that destination.

The game was made for the monthly game jam of Budapest for the theme of Co-op 2020 November.
